property.name: spark.yarn.queue
property.description: The name of the YARN queue to which the application is submitted.

property.name: spark.driver.extraLibraryPath
property.description: â€‚Set a special library path to use when launching the driver JVM.

property.name: spark.executor.extraLibraryPath
property.description: Set a special library path to use when launching the executor JVM.

property.name: spark.history.provider
property.description: Name of history provider class

property.name: spark.history.fs.logDirectory
property.description: Base directory for history spark application log. It is the same value as in spark-defaults.xml.

property.name: spark.eventLog.enabled
property.description: Whether to log Spark events, useful for reconstructing the Web UI after the application has finished.

property.name: spark.eventLog.dir
property.description: Base directory in which Spark events are logged, if spark.eventLog.enabled is true. It is the same value as in spark-defaults.xml.

property.name: spark.scheduler.allocation.file
property.description: Scheduler configuration file for thriftserver.

property.name: spark.scheduler.mode
property.description: The scheduling mode between jobs submitted to the same SparkContext.

property.name: spark.shuffle.service.enabled
property.description: Enables the external shuffle service.

property.name: spark.hadoop.cacheConf
property.description: Specifies whether HadoopRDD caches the Hadoop configuration object

property.name: spark.dynamicAllocation.enabled
property.description: Whether to use dynamic resource allocation, which scales the number of executors registered with this application up and down based on the workload.

property.name: spark.dynamicAllocation.initialExecutors
property.description: Initial number of executors to run if dynamic allocation is enabled.

property.name: spark.dynamicAllocation.maxExecutors
property.description: Upper bound for the number of executors if dynamic allocation is enabled.

property.name: spark.dynamicAllocation.minExecutors
property.description: Lower bound for the number of executors if dynamic allocation is enabled.

property.name: spark.yarn.executor.failuresValidityInterval
property.description: Defines the validity interval for executor failure tracking. Executor failures which are older than the validity interval will be ignored.

property.name: spark.yarn.maxAppAttempts
property.description: The maximum number of attempts that will be made to submit the application. It should be no larger than the global number of max attempts in the YARN configuration.

property.name: spark.history.fs.cleaner.enabled
property.description: Specifies whether the History Server should periodically clean up event logs from storage.

property.name: spark.history.fs.cleaner.interval
property.description: How often the filesystem job history cleaner checks for files to delete. Files are only deleted if they are older than spark.history.fs.cleaner.maxAge

property.name: spark.history.fs.cleaner.maxAge
property.description: Job history files older than this will be deleted when the filesystem history cleaner runs.

property.name: spark.sql.autoBroadcastJoinThreshold
property.description: Configures the maximum size in bytes for a table that will be broadcast to all worker nodes when performing a join.

property.name: spark.io.compression.lz4.blockSize
property.description: Block size in bytes used in LZ4 compression, in the case when LZ4 compression codec is used. Lowering this block size will also lower shuffle memory usage when LZ4 is used.

property.name: spark.sql.orc.filterPushdown
property.description: Enables filter pushdown for ORC formats.

property.name: spark.sql.hive.convertMetastoreOrc
property.description: Enables new ORC format to read/write Hive Tables.

property.name: spark.shuffle.io.serverThreads
property.description: Number of threads used in the server thread pool.

property.name: spark.shuffle.io.backLog
property.description: Requested maximum length of the queue of incoming connections.

property.name: spark.shuffle.file.buffer
property.description: Size of the in-memory buffer for each shuffle file output stream, in KiB unless otherwise specified. These buffers reduce the number of disk seeks and system calls made in creating intermediate shuffle files.

property.name: spark.shuffle.unsafe.file.output.buffer
property.description: The file system for this buffer size after each partition is written in unsafe shuffle writer. In KiB unless otherwise specified.

property.name: spark.master
property.description: The deploying mode of spark application, by default it is yarn-client for thrift-server but local mode for there's only one nodemanager.
